trans-unit.source: Data-type objects must be reference counted so be aware of the action on the data-type reference of different C-API calls. The standard rule is that when a data-type object is returned it is a new reference. Functions that take PyArray_Descr * objects and return arrays steal references to the data-type their inputs unless otherwise noted. Therefore, you must own a reference to any data-type object used as input to such a function.
trans-unit.target: 数据类型对象必须进行引用计数，因此请注意对不同C-API调用的数据类型引用的操作。标准规则是，当返回数据类型对象时，它是一个新引用。除非另有说明，否则采用 PyArray_Descr * 对象并返回数组的函数会窃取对其输入数据类型的引用。因此，您必须拥有对用作该函数输入的任何数据类型对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: Datetimes are always stored based on POSIX time (though having a TAI mode which allows for accounting of leap-seconds is proposed), with an epoch of 1970-01-01T00:00Z. This means the supported dates are always a symmetric interval around the epoch, called “time span” in the table below.
trans-unit.target: 日期时间始终基于POSIX时间进行存储（尽管建议使用TAI模式来考虑leap秒），其纪元为1970-01-01T00：00Z。这意味着支持的日期始终是每个时期的对称间隔，在下表中称为“时间跨度”。

trans-unit.source: Deciding what case applies, checking broadcasting, and determining the kind of transposition needed are all done in PyArray_MapIterNew. After setting up, there are two cases. If there is no subarray or it only has one element, no subarray iteration is necessary and an iterator is prepared which iterates all indexing arrays as well as the result or value array. If there is a subarray, there are three iterators prepared. One for the indexing arrays, one for the result or value array (minus its subarray), and one for the subarrays of the original and the result/assignment array. The first two iterators give (or allow calculation) of the pointers into the start of the subarray, which then allows to restart the subarray iteration.
trans-unit.target: 确定适用的情况，检查广播并确定所需的转置类型都在 PyArray_MapIterNew 中完成。设置后，有两种情况。如果没有子数组或只有一个元素，则不需要子数组迭代，并且准备一个迭代器，该迭代器将迭代所有索引数组以及结果或值数组。如果有子数组，则准备三个迭代器。一种用于索引数组，一种用于结果或值数组（减去其子数组），另一种用于原始数组和结果/赋值数组的子数组。前两个迭代器将指针分配（或允许计算）到子数组的开头，然后允许重新启动子数组迭代。

trans-unit.source: Defining an NpyAuxData is similar to defining a class in C++, but the object semantics have to be tracked manually since the API is in C. Here’s an example for a function which doubles up an element using an element copier function as a primitive.

trans-unit.source: Deprecated since version 1.14: Passing sep='', the default, is deprecated since it will trigger the deprecated binary mode of this function. This mode interprets string as binary bytes, rather than ASCII text with decimal numbers, an operation which is better spelt frombuffer(string, dtype, count). If string contains unicode text, the binary mode of fromstring will first encode it into bytes using either utf-8 (python 3) or the default encoding (python 2), neither of which produce sane results.
trans-unit.target: 自版本1.14起不推荐使用：默认情况下，不建议传递 sep='' ，因为它将触发此功能的不推荐二进制模式。此模式将 string 解释为二进制字节，而不是使用带十进制数字的ASCII文本，此操作最好由 frombuffer(string, dtype, count) 拼写。如果 string 包含unicode文本，则 fromstring 的二进制模式将首先使用utf-8（python 3）或默认编码（python 2）将其编码为字节，这两种方法均不会产生合理的结果。

trans-unit.source: Describing the motivation for a change, the nature of a bug for bug fixes or some details on what an enhancement does are also good to include in a commit message. Messages should be understandable without looking at the code changes. A commit message like MAINT: fixed another one is an example of what not to do; the reader has to go look for context elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 描述更改的动机，错误修复的错误的性质或有关增强功能的一些详细信息也可以包含在提交消息中。消息应该易于理解，而无需查看代码更改。诸如 MAINT: fixed another one 的提交消息：修复另一个是不执行操作的示例；读者必须去别处寻找上下文。

trans-unit.source: Determine if newstrides is a strides array consistent with the memory of an nd -dimensional array with shape dims and element-size, elsize. The newstrides array is checked to see if jumping by the provided number of bytes in each direction will ever mean jumping more than numbytes which is the assumed size of the available memory segment. If numbytes is 0, then an equivalent numbytes is computed assuming nd, dims, and elsize refer to a single-segment array. Return NPY_TRUE if newstrides is acceptable, otherwise return NPY_FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 确定newstrides是否为与形状为 dims 且元素大小为elsize的nd维数组的内存一致的strides数组。所述newstrides阵列被检查，看看是否通过跳跃的字节的数量设置在每个方向将永远平均跳跃超过的numBytes其是可用的内存段的假定大小。如果numbytes为0，则假定nd，dims和elsize引用单段数组，则计算等效的bytebytes。如果有新 NPY_TRUE 则返回NPY_TRUE是可以接受的，否则返回 NPY_FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Different ndarrays can share the same data, so that changes made in one ndarray may be visible in another. That is, an ndarray can be a “view” to another ndarray, and the data it is referring to is taken care of by the “base” ndarray. ndarrays can also be views to memory owned by Python strings or objects implementing the buffer or array interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 不同的 ndarrays 可以共享相同的数据，因此在一个 ndarray 中所做的更改可能在另一ndarray中可见。也就是说，一个ndarray可以是另一个ndarray 的“视图”，并且它所引用的数据由“基本” ndarray处理。ndarrays也可以是实现 buffer 或数组接口的Python strings 或对象所拥有的内存的视图。

trans-unit.source: Dispatch-able sources are special C files that can be compiled multiple times with different compiler flags and also with different C definitions. These affect code paths to enable certain instruction-sets for each compiled object according to “the configuration statements” that must be declared between a C comment(/**/) and start with a special mark @targets at the top of each dispatch-able source. At the same time, dispatch-able sources will be treated as normal C sources if the optimization was disabled by the command argument --disable-optimization .
trans-unit.target: 可分发的源代码是特殊的C文件，可以使用不同的编译器标志以及不同的C定义多次编译这些C文件。这些会影响代码路径，以根据“配置语句”为每个编译对象启用某些指令集，这些指令集必须在C注释 (/**/) 之间声明，并在每个调度的顶部以特殊标记@targets开头，有能力的来源。同时，如果通过命令参数 --disable-optimization 禁用了优化，则可调度源将被视为普通C源。

trans-unit.source: Do not let perfect be the enemy of the good, particularly for documentation. If you find yourself making many small suggestions, or being too nitpicky on style or grammar, consider merging the current PR when all important concerns are addressed. Then, either push a commit directly (if you are a maintainer) or open a follow-up PR yourself.
trans-unit.target: 不要让完美成为好的敌人,特别是对于文档。如果你发现自己提出了很多小建议,或者在风格或语法上过于挑剔,可以考虑在所有重要的问题都解决后,合并当前的PR。然后,直接推送一个提交(如果你是维护者),或者自己开一个后续PR。

trans-unit.source: Do not rely on the combination of tofile and fromfile for data storage, as the binary files generated are are not platform independent. In particular, no byte-order or data-type information is saved. Data can be stored in the platform independent .npy format using save and load instead.
trans-unit.target: 不要依赖于 tofile 和 fromfile 的组合来进行数据存储，因为生成的二进制文件不是平台无关的。特别是，不保存字节顺序或数据类型信息。可以使用 save 和 load 独立于平台的 .npy 格式存储数据。

trans-unit.source: Do not rely on the combination of tofile and fromfile for data storage, as the binary files generated are not platform independent. In particular, no byte-order or data-type information is saved. Data can be stored in the platform independent .npy format using save and load instead.
trans-unit.target: 不要依赖于 tofile 和 fromfile 的组合来进行数据存储，因为生成的二进制文件不是平台无关的。特别是，不保存字节顺序或数据类型信息。可以使用 save 和 load 来以独立于平台的 .npy 格式存储数据。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the Python keywords and and or to combine logical array expressions. These keywords will test the truth value of the entire array (not element-by-element as you might expect). Use the bitwise operators & and | instead.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用Python关键字 and 和 or 来组合逻辑数组表达式。这些关键字将测试整个数组的真值（而不是您可能期望的逐个元素）。使用按位运算符＆和| |。代替。

trans-unit.target: 只为自己的功能分支做这件事。

trans-unit.source: Doctests
trans-unit.target: Doctests

trans-unit.source: Doctests are a convenient way of documenting the behavior of a function and allowing that behavior to be tested at the same time. The output of an interactive Python session can be included in the docstring of a function, and the test framework can run the example and compare the actual output to the expected output.
trans-unit.target: Doctests 是一种方便的方式,它可以记录一个函数的行为,同时允许对该行为进行测试。交互式Python会话的输出可以包含在函数的docstring中,测试框架可以运行该示例并将实际输出与预期输出进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Document these as you would any other function. Do not include self in the list of parameters. If a method has an equivalent function (which is the case for many ndarray methods for example), the function docstring should contain the detailed documentation, and the method docstring should refer to it. Only put brief summary and See Also sections in the method docstring. The method should use a Returns or Yields section, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 像记录其他任何功能一样，将它们记录下来。不要在参数列表中包含 self 。如果方法具有等效功能（例如，许多ndarray方法就是这种情况），则函数docstring应该包含详细的文档，方法docstring应该引用它。仅在方法docstring中放入简短的摘要和“另请参阅”部分。该方法应该使用返回或产量部分，适当的。

trans-unit.source: Documentation needs to meet users where they are. How-tos offer get-it-done information; the user wants steps to copy and doesn’t necessarily want to understand NumPy. Tutorials are warm-fuzzy information; the user wants a feel for some aspect of NumPy (and again, may or may not care about deeper knowledge).
trans-unit.target: 文档需要满足用户的需求。 How-tos 提供“完成”信息；用户想要复制的步骤，而不一定要了解NumPy。 Tutorials 是模糊的信息；用户希望对NumPy的某个方面有一种感觉（再次，可能会或可能不会在乎更深的知识）。

trans-unit.source: Due to floating point rounding the resulting array may not be Hermitian, the diagonal elements may not be 1, and the elements may not satisfy the inequality abs(a) <= 1. The real and imaginary parts are clipped to the interval [-1, 1] in an attempt to improve on that situation but is not much help in the complex case.
trans-unit.target: 由于浮点舍入，结果数组可能不是Hermitian，对角元素可能不是1，并且这些元素可能不满足不等式abs（a）<=1。实部和虚部均裁剪为区间[-1 ，[1]试图改善这种情况，但在复杂情况下并没有太大帮助。

trans-unit.source: Due to limitations in the interpretation of structured dtypes, dtypes with fields with empty names will have the names replaced by ‘f0’, ‘f1’, etc. Such arrays will not round-trip through the format entirely accurately. The data is intact; only the field names will differ. We are working on a fix for this. This fix will not require a change in the file format. The arrays with such structures can still be saved and restored, and the correct dtype may be restored by using the loadedarray.view(correct_dtype) method.
trans-unit.target: 由于对结构化dtypes的解释的限制，具有空名称字段的dtypes的名称将替换为'f0'，'f1'等。此类数组将无法完全准确地遍历格式。数据完整无缺；只有字段名称会有所不同。我们正在为此修复。此修复程序不需要更改文件格式。具有此类结构的数组仍可以保存和还原，并且可以使用 loadedarray.view(correct_dtype) 方法还原正确的dtype。

trans-unit.source: Dump a pickle of the array to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 将数组的pickle转到指定的文件中。

trans-unit.target: 将数组的pickle转储到指定的文件中。数组可以用pickle.load或numpy.load来读取。

trans-unit.source: During iteration, you may want to use the index of the current element in a computation. For example, you may want to visit the elements of an array in memory order, but use a C-order, Fortran-order, or multidimensional index to look up values in a different array.
trans-unit.target: 在迭代过程中,你可能想在计算中使用当前元素的索引。例如,你可能想按内存顺序访问一个数组的元素,但使用C顺序、Fortran顺序或多维索引来查找不同数组中的值。

trans-unit.source: During the everyday project activities, council members participate in all discussions, code review and other project activities as peers with all other Contributors and the Community. In these everyday activities, Council Members do not have any special power or privilege through their membership on the Council. However, it is expected that because of the quality and quantity of their contributions and their expert knowledge of the Project Software and Services that Council Members will provide useful guidance, both technical and in terms of project direction, to potentially less experienced contributors.
trans-unit.target: 在日常的项目活动中,理事会成员作为同行与所有其他贡献者和社区一起参与所有讨论、代码审查和其他项目活动。在这些日常活动中,理事会成员并不因其在理事会中的成员身份而拥有任何特殊的权力或特权。但是,由于他们所做贡献的质量和数量以及他们对项目软件和服务的专业知识,预计理事会成员将向可能经验不足的贡献者提供技术和项目方向方面的有益指导。

trans-unit.source: During the loading of the NumPy module, there’s a validation step which detects this behavior. It will raise a Python runtime error to inform the user. This is to prevent the CPU reaching an illegal instruction error causing a segfault.
trans-unit.target: 在加载NumPy模块期间，有一个验证步骤可以检测到此行为。它将引发Python运行时错误以通知用户。这是为了防止CPU到达导致段错误的非法指令错误。

trans-unit.source: Each array in the tuple has the same shape as the indices array.
trans-unit.target: 元组中的每个数组都具有与 indices 数组相同的形状。

trans-unit.source: Each array must have the same shape.
trans-unit.target: 每个数组必须具有相同的形状。

trans-unit.source: Each boolean array corresponds to a function in funclist. Wherever condlist[i] is True, funclist[i](x) is used as the output value.
trans-unit.target: 每个布尔数组对应于 funclist 中的一个函数。只要 condlist[i] 为True， funclist[i](x) 用作输出值。

trans-unit.source: Each boolean array in condlist selects a piece of x, and should therefore be of the same shape as x.
trans-unit.target: condlist 中的每个布尔数组都选择一个 x ，因此应与 x 具有相同的形状。

trans-unit.source: Each built-in data-type has a character code (the updated Numeric typecodes), that uniquely identifies it.
trans-unit.target: 每个内置的数据类型都有一个字符代码(更新后的Numeric类型代码),它是唯一的标识。

trans-unit.source: Each differentiation is multiplied by scl. The end result is multiplication by scl**m. This is for use in a linear change of variable. (Default: 1)
trans-unit.target: 每个微分乘以 scl 。最终结果是与 scl**m 相乘。用于变量的线性变化。（默认值：1）

trans-unit.source: Each dimension in the signature is matched to a dimension of the corresponding passed-in array, starting from the end of the shape tuple.
trans-unit.target: 签名中的每个维度从形状元组的末尾开始,与相应的传入数组的维度相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Each dimension in the signature is matched to a dimension of the corresponding passed-in array, starting from the end of the shape tuple. These are the core dimensions, and they must be present in the arrays, or an error will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 签名中的每一个维度都与相应的传入数组的维度相匹配,从形状元组的末端开始。这些是核心维度,它们必须存在于数组中,否则会出现错误。

trans-unit.source: Each element of a represents a bit-field that should be unpacked into a binary-valued output array. The shape of the output array is either 1-D (if axis is None) or the same shape as the input array with unpacking done along the axis specified.
trans-unit.target: 的每个元件 a 代表一个位字段应该被解压成二进制值输出阵列。输出数组的形状可以是1-D（如果 axis 为 None ），也可以是与输入数组相同的形状，并且沿指定的轴进行拆包。

trans-unit.source: Each element of the sum of the ‘ipmt’ and ‘ppmt’ arrays should equal ‘pmt’.
trans-unit.target: “ ipmt”和“ ppmt”数组之和的每个元素应等于“ pmt”。

trans-unit.source: Each entry in the mymethods array is a PyMethodDef structure containing 1) the Python name, 2) the C-function that implements the function, 3) flags indicating whether or not keywords are accepted for this function, and 4) The docstring for the function. Any number of functions may be defined for a single module by adding more entries to this table. The last entry must be all NULL as shown to act as a sentinel. Python looks for this entry to know that all of the functions for the module have been defined.
trans-unit.target: mymethods数组中的每个条目都是一个 PyMethodDef 结构，其中包含1）Python名称，2）实现该函数的C函数，3）表示该函数是否接受关键字的标志以及4）该函数的文档字符串。通过向该表添加更多条目，可以为单个模块定义任意数量的功能。如图所示，最后一个条目必须全为NULL，以充当哨兵。Python查找该条目以了解模块的所有功能均已定义。

trans-unit.source: Each entry will be the default for the corresponding column
trans-unit.target: 每个条目将是相应列的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Each function is evaluated over x wherever its corresponding condition is True. It should take a 1d array as input and give an 1d array or a scalar value as output. If, instead of a callable, a scalar is provided then a constant function (lambda x: scalar) is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 每个功能之上评价 x 无论其对应的条件为真。它应该以1d数组作为输入，并给出1d数组或标量值作为输出。如果提供了标量而不是可调用的标 lambda x: scalar 则假定为常数函数（lambda x：scalar）。

trans-unit.source: Each generalized ufunc has information associated with it that states what the “core” dimensionality of the inputs is, as well as the corresponding dimensionality of the outputs (the element-wise ufuncs have zero core dimensions). The list of the core dimensions for all arguments is called the “signature” of a ufunc. For example, the ufunc numpy.add has signature (),()->() defining two scalar inputs and one scalar output.
trans-unit.target: 每个广义ufunc都有与之相关的信息，该信息说明输入的“核心”维数是什么，以及输出的相应维数（逐个元素的ufunc具有零核心维）。所有参数的核心维度列表称为ufunc的“签名”。例如，ufunc numpy.add具有签名 (),()->() ,它们定义两个标量输入和一个标量输出。

trans-unit.source: Each item is used as an “op_axes” argument to an nditer
trans-unit.target: 每个项目都用作nditer的“ op_axes”参数

trans-unit.source: Each key can be a column index or a column name, and the corresponding value should be a single object. We can use the special key None to define a default for all columns.
trans-unit.target: 每个键可以是列索引或列名，并且对应的值应该是单个对象。我们可以使用特殊键 None 为所有列定义默认值。

trans-unit.source: Each line past the first skip_header lines is split at the delimiter character, and characters following the comments character are discarded.
trans-unit.target: skip_header 第一个skip_header行的每一行都在 delimiter 处分割，并且 comments 字符之后的字符将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Each module should have a docstring with at least a summary line. Other sections are optional, and should be used in the same order as for documenting functions when they are appropriate:
trans-unit.target: 每个模块都应该有一个至少有一行摘要的 docstring。其他部分是可选的,在合适的情况下,应按照与记录功能相同的顺序使用。

trans-unit.source: Each of the arithmetic operations (+, -, *, /, //, %, divmod(), ** or pow(), <<, >>, &, ^, |, ~) and the comparisons (==, <, >, <=, >=, !=) is equivalent to the corresponding universal function (or ufunc for short) in NumPy. For more information, see the section on Universal Functions.
trans-unit.target: 每个算术运算（ + ， - ， * ， / ， // ， % ， divmod() ， ** 或 pow() ， << ， >> ， & ， ^ ， | ， ~ ）和比较（ == ， < ， > ， <= ， >= ， != ）等效于相应的通用功能（或ufunc在NumPy的简称）。有关更多信息，请参见通用函数。

trans-unit.source: Each of the arithmetic operations (+, -, *, /, //, %, divmod(), ** or pow(), <<, >>, &, ^, |, ~) and the comparisons (==, <, >, <=, >=, !=) is equivalent to the corresponding universal function (or ufunc for short) in NumPy. For more information, see the section on Universal Functions.
trans-unit.target: 每个算术运算（ + ， - ， * ， / ， // ， % ， divmod() ， ** 或 pow() ， << ， >> ， & ， ^ ， | ， ~ ）和比较（ == ， < ， > ， <= ， >= ， != ）等效于相应的通用功能（或ufunc在NumPy的简称）。有关更多信息，请参见通用函数。

trans-unit.source: Each of these 12 classes is collected into a unittest.TestSuite, which is then executed. Errors and failures are summed together and returned as the exit argument. Any non-zero result indicates that at least one test did not pass.
trans-unit.target: 这12个类中的每一个都被收集到 unittest.TestSuite 中，然后执行它。错误和失败加在一起，并作为退出参数返回。任何非零结果表示至少一项测试未通过。

trans-unit.source: Each of these sub-topics is covered in the following sub-sections.
trans-unit.target: 以下各小节分别介绍这些小专题。

trans-unit.source: Each row in the text file must have the same number of values.
trans-unit.target: 文本文件中的每一行必须有相同数量的值。

trans-unit.source: Each sequence should be of integer or boolean type. Boolean sequences will be interpreted as boolean masks for the corresponding dimension (equivalent to passing in np.nonzero(boolean_sequence)).
trans-unit.target: 每个序列应为整数或布尔类型。布尔序列将被解释为对应维的布尔掩码（等效于传递 np.nonzero(boolean_sequence) ）。

trans-unit.source: Each test defined by the VectorTestCase class extracts the python function it is trying to test by accessing the Vector module’s dictionary:
trans-unit.target: VectorTestCase 类定义的每个测试都通过访问 Vector 模块的字典来提取其正尝试测试的python函数：

trans-unit.source: Each tuple has the form (fieldname, datatype, shape) where shape is optional. fieldname is a string (or tuple if titles are used, see Field Titles below), datatype may be any object convertible to a datatype, and shape is a tuple of integers specifying subarray shape.
trans-unit.target: 每个元组具有形式 (fieldname, datatype, shape) ，其中形状是可选的。 fieldname 是一个字符串（如果使用标题则为元组，如果使用标题，请参见下面的字段标题）， datatype 可以是可转换为数据类型的任何对象，并且 shape 是指定子数组形状的整数元组。

trans-unit.source: Each ufunc consists of an elementary function that performs the most basic operation on the smallest portion of array arguments (e.g. adding two numbers is the most basic operation in adding two arrays). The ufunc applies the elementary function multiple times on different parts of the arrays. The input/output of elementary functions can be vectors; e.g., the elementary function of inner1d takes two vectors as input.
trans-unit.target: 每个ufunc由一个基本函数组成,该函数对数组参数的最小部分执行最基本的操作(例如,将两个数字相加是将两个数组相加中最基本的操作)。ufunc对数组的不同部分多次应用基本函数。基本函数的输入/输出可以是向量,例如,inner1d的基本函数以两个向量作为输入。

trans-unit.source: Each universal function takes array inputs and produces array outputs by performing the core function element-wise on the inputs (where an element is generally a scalar, but can be a vector or higher-order sub-array for generalized ufuncs). Standard broadcasting rules are applied so that inputs not sharing exactly the same shapes can still be usefully operated on. Broadcasting can be understood by four rules:
trans-unit.target: 每个通用函数都接受数组输入,并通过在输入上按元素执行核心函数来产生数组输出(其中元素通常是一个标量,但对于通用的ufuncs来说,可以是一个向量或高阶子数组)。标准的广播规则被应用,因此,对于形状不完全相同的输入,仍然可以进行有效的操作。广播可以通过四个规则来理解。

trans-unit.source: Either NULL or an array of NPY_NSCALARKINDS pointers. These pointers should each be either NULL or a pointer to an array of integers (terminated by NPY_NOTYPE) indicating data-types that a scalar of this data-type of the specified kind can be cast to safely (this usually means without losing precision).

trans-unit.source: Either None or a readonly dictionary of metadata (mappingproxy).
trans-unit.target: 任一 None 或元数据（mappingproxy）的只读字典。

trans-unit.source: Either None to indicate a C-style contiguous array or a Tuple of strides which provides the number of bytes needed to jump to the next array element in the corresponding dimension. Each entry must be an integer (a Python int). As with shape, the values may be larger than can be represented by a C int or long; the calling code should handle this appropriately, either by raising an error, or by using long long in C. The default is None which implies a C-style contiguous memory buffer. In this model, the last dimension of the array varies the fastest. For example, the default strides tuple for an object whose array entries are 8 bytes long and whose shape is (10, 20, 30) would be (4800, 240, 8)
trans-unit.target: “ None 表示C样式的连续数组，或者“跨步元组”提供跨越到相应维中的下一个数组元素所需的字节数。每个条目必须是整数（Python int ）。与形状一样，值可能大于C int 或 long 表示的值。调用代码应该通过引发错误或通过在C中使用 long long 来适当地处理此问题。默认值为 None ，这意味着C样式的连续内存缓冲区。在此模型中，阵列的最后一个维度变化最快。例如，默认对象跨度为元组的对象，该对象的数组入口为8个字节长，形状为 (10, 20, 30) 会是 (4800, 240, 8)

trans-unit.source: Either None to indicate a C-style contiguous array or a Tuple of strides which provides the number of bytes needed to jump to the next array element in the corresponding dimension. Each entry must be an integer (a Python int or long). As with shape, the values may be larger than can be represented by a C “int” or “long”; the calling code should handle this appropriately, either by raising an error, or by using Py_LONG_LONG in C. The default is None which implies a C-style contiguous memory buffer. In this model, the last dimension of the array varies the fastest. For example, the default strides tuple for an object whose array entries are 8 bytes long and whose shape is (10,20,30) would be (4800, 240, 8)

trans-unit.source: Either a basic-type description string as in typestr or another list (for nested structured types)
trans-unit.target: 如typestr中的基本类型描述字符串或其他列表（对于嵌套结构化类型）

trans-unit.source: Either a data-type, a tuple of data-types, or a special signature string indicating the input and output types of a ufunc. This argument allows you to provide a specific signature for the 1-d loop to use in the underlying calculation. If the loop specified does not exist for the ufunc, then a TypeError is raised. Normally, a suitable loop is found automatically by comparing the input types with what is available and searching for a loop with data-types to which all inputs can be cast safely. This keyword argument lets you bypass that search and choose a particular loop. A list of available signatures is provided by the types attribute of the ufunc object. For backwards compatibility this argument can also be provided as sig, although the long form is preferred. Note that this should not be confused with the generalized ufunc signature that is stored in the signature attribute of the of the ufunc object.
trans-unit.target: 数据类型，数据类型的元组或指示ufunc的输入和输出类型的特殊签名字符串。此参数允许您为1-d循环提供特定的签名，以在基础计算中使用。如果为ufunc指定的循环不存在，则引发TypeError。通常，通过将输入类型与可用输入类型进行比较，并搜索一个可以安全地将所有输入转换为数据类型的数据类型的循环，可以自动找到合适的循环。此关键字参数使您可以绕过该搜索并选择特定的循环。ufunc对象的types属性提供了可用签名的列表。为了向后兼容，此参数也可以作为sig提供，尽管长格式是首选。请注意，这不应与存储在ufunc对象的signature属性中的通用ufunc 签名相混淆。

trans-unit.source: Either a data-type, a tuple of data-types, or a special signature string indicating the input and output types of a ufunc. Normally, a suitable loop is found automatically by comparing the input types with what is available and searching for a loop with data-types to which all inputs can be cast safely. This keyword argument lets you bypass that search and choose a particular loop. A list of available signatures is provided by the types attribute of the ufunc object. trans-unit.source: Either commas or spaces can be used as a separator, e.g. --cpu-dispatch= “avx2 avx512f” or --cpu-dispatch= “avx2, avx512f” both work, but the arguments must be enclosed in quotes.
trans-unit.target: 逗号或空格都可以用作分隔符，例如 --cpu-dispatch =“ avx2 avx512f”或 --cpu-dispatch =“ avx2，avx512f”都可以，但是参数必须用引号引起来。

trans-unit.target: 处理传递的参数要么是njoin（'a'，'b'）中的n个参数，要么是njoin（['a'，'b']）中的n个名称序列，或者是这些参数的混合。

trans-unit.source: Either the file name (string) or an open file (file-like object) where the data will be saved. If file is a string or a Path, the .npz extension will be appended to the file name if it is not already there.
trans-unit.target: 文件名（字符串）或打开的文件（类似文件的对象）将在其中保存数据。如果文件是字符串或路径，则 .npz 扩展名将附加到文件名（如果尚不存在）。

trans-unit.source: Either the filename (string) or an open file (file-like object) where the data will be saved. If file is a string or a Path, the .npz extension will be appended to the filename if it is not already there.

trans-unit.source: Element index to partition by. The k-th element will be in its final sorted position and all smaller elements will be moved before it and all larger elements behind it. The order all elements in the partitions is undefined. If provided with a sequence of k-th it will partition all of them into their sorted position at once.
trans-unit.target: 要分割的元素索引。第k个元素将处于最终的排序位置,所有较小的元素将被移到它之前,所有较大的元素将被移到它之后。分区中所有元素的顺序是未定义的。如果提供了一个k-th的序列,它将一次把所有元素分到它们的排序位置。

trans-unit.source: Element index to partition by. The k-th value of the element will be in its final sorted position and all smaller elements will be moved before it and all equal or greater elements behind it. The order of all elements in the partitions is undefined. If provided with a sequence of k-th it will partition all elements indexed by k-th of them into their sorted position at once.
trans-unit.target: 元素的索引,以分割。元素的第k个值将处于最终的排序位置,所有较小的元素将被移到它的前面,所有相等或较大的元素将被移到它的后面。分区中所有元素的顺序是未定义的。如果提供一个k-th的序列,它将把所有以k-th为索引的元素一次性分区到它们的排序位置。

trans-unit.source: Element index to partition by. The kth element value will be in its final sorted position and all smaller elements will be moved before it and all equal or greater elements behind it. The order of all elements in the partitions is undefined. If provided with a sequence of kth it will partition all elements indexed by kth of them into their sorted position at once.
trans-unit.target: 要分割的元素索引。第k个元素的值将处于最终的排序位置,所有较小的元素将被移到它的前面,所有相等或较大的元素将被移到它的后面。分区中所有元素的顺序是未定义的。如果提供一个kth的序列,它将把所有以kth为索引的元素一次性分区到它们的排序位置。

trans-unit.source: Emit py3kwarnings for division of integer arrays
trans-unit.target: 对整数组的除法发出py3kwarnings警告

trans-unit.source: Emphasize empathy for individuals rather than judging behavior, avoiding binary labels of “good” and “bad/evil”. Overt, clear-cut aggression and harassment exists and we will be address that firmly. But many scenarios that can prove challenging to resolve are those where normal disagreements devolve into unhelpful or harmful behavior from multiple parties. Understanding the full context and finding a path that re-engages all is hard, but ultimately the most productive for our community.
trans-unit.target: 强调对个人的同情而不是判断行为，避免使用“好”和“坏/邪恶”的二元标签。存在公开，明确的侵略和骚扰，我们将坚定地解决这一问题。但是，许多解决方案可能难以解决，因为正常的分歧会导致多方无益或有害的行为。了解完整的环境并找到一条使所有人重新参与的道路非常困难，但最终对我们的社区而言是最富有成效的。

trans-unit.target: 在现有数组上建模的空掩模数组。

trans-unit.target: 空的掩码数组,所有元素都被掩码。

trans-unit.target: 用现有数组的属性清空掩码数组。

trans-unit.target: 在编译时启用AVX2/AVX512。

trans-unit.target: 启用多平台SIMD编译器优化。

trans-unit.source: Enables support for iteration of sub-ranges of the full iterindex range [0, NpyIter_IterSize(iter)). Use the function NpyIter_ResetToIterIndexRange to specify a range for iteration.
trans-unit.target: 启用对整个 iterindex 范围 [0, NpyIter_IterSize(iter)) 的子范围的迭代的支持。使用函数 NpyIter_ResetToIterIndexRange 指定迭代范围。

trans-unit.source: Enables the specified array flags. This function does no validation, and assumes that you know what you’re doing.
trans-unit.target: 启用指定的数组标志。该函数不进行验证，并假定您知道自己在做什么。

trans-unit.source: Encapsulate the functionality of functions and methods that take the axis= keyword and work properly with None as the axis argument. The input array is obj, while *axis is a converted integer (so that >=MAXDIMS is the None value), and requirements gives the needed properties of obj. The output is a converted version of the input so that requirements are met and if needed a flattening has occurred. On output negative values of *axis are converted and the new value is checked to ensure consistency with the shape of obj.
trans-unit.target: 封装采用axis =关键字并正确使用None作为axis参数的函数和方法的功能。输入数组是 obj ，而 *axis 是转换后的整数（因此> = MAXDIMS是None值），并且 requirements 给出了 obj 所需的属性。输出是输入的转换版本，因此可以满足要求，并且在需要时进行展平。在输出时，将转换 *axis 的负值，并检查新值以确保与 obj 的形状一致。

trans-unit.source: Enclose variables in single backticks. The colon must be preceded by a space, or omitted if the type is absent.
trans-unit.target: 用单个反标符来封闭变量。冒号前必须有空格,如果没有类型,则省略。

trans-unit.source: Encoding argument for text IO functions
trans-unit.target: 文本IO函数的编码参数

trans-unit.source: Encoding used to decode the inputfile. Does not apply to input streams.
trans-unit.target: 用于解码输入文件的编码。不适用于输入流。

trans-unit.source: Encoding used to decode the inputfile. Does not apply to input streams. The special value ‘bytes’ enables backward compatibility workarounds that ensures you receive byte arrays as results if possible and passes ‘latin1’ encoded strings to converters. Override this value to receive unicode arrays and pass strings as input to converters. If set to None the system default is used. The default value is ‘bytes’.
trans-unit.target: 用于解码输入文件的编码。不适用于输入流。特殊值'bytes'支持向后兼容的解决方法，可确保您尽可能接收字节数组作为结果，并将'latin1'编码的字符串传递给转换器。覆盖此值以接收unicode数组，并将字符串作为输入传递给转换器。如果设置为“无”，则使用系统默认值。默认值为“字节”。

The special value ‘bytes’ enables backward compatibility workarounds that ensure that you receive byte arrays when possible and passes latin1 encoded strings to converters. Override this value to receive unicode arrays and pass strings as input to converters. If set to None the system default is used. The default value is ‘bytes’.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.all (self, axis). Return an array with True elements for every 1-d sub-array of self defined by axis in which all the elements are True.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.all （self，axis）。对于 axis 定义的 self 定义的每个1-d子数组，返回一个包含True元素的数组，其中所有元素均为True。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.any (self, axis). Return an array with True elements for every 1-d sub-array of self defined by axis in which any of the elements are True.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.any （self，axis）。对于由其中任何元素为True的axis定义的self的每个1-d子数组，返回一个包含True元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.argmax (self, axis). Return the index of the largest element of self along axis.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.argmax （self，axis）。返回self沿axis的最大元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.argmin (self, axis). Return the index of the smallest element of self along axis.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.argmin （self，axis）。返回自身最小元素沿轴的索引。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.argpartition (self, ktharray, axis, kind). Return an array of indices such that selection of these indices along the given axis would return a partitioned version of self.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.argpartition （self，ktharray，axis，kind）。返回一个索引数组，这样沿给定 axis 选择这些索引将返回self的分区版本。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.argsort (self, axis). Return an array of indices such that selection of these indices along the given axis would return a sorted version of self. If self ->descr is a data-type with fields defined, then self->descr->names is used to determine the sort order. A comparison where the first field is equal will use the second field and so on. To alter the sort order of a structured array, create a new data-type with a different order of names and construct a view of the array with that new data-type.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.argsort （self，axis）。返回一个索引数组，这样沿给定 axis 选择这些索引将返回self的排序版本。如果self- > descr是定义了字段的数据类型，则使用self-> descr-> names确定排序顺序。第一个字段相等的比较将使用第二个字段，依此类推。要更改结构化数组的排序顺序，请创建具有不同名称顺序的新数据类型，并使用该新数据类型构造数组的视图。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.byteswap (self, inplace). Return an array whose data area is byteswapped. If inplace is non-zero, then do the byteswap inplace and return a reference to self. Otherwise, create a byteswapped copy and leave self unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.byteswap （个体经营，就地）。返回数据区域为字节包装的数组。如果就地不为零，然后执行字节交换就地并返回一个引用自我。否则，请创建一个字节包装的副本，并使自己保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.choose (self, op, ret, clipmode). Create a new array by selecting elements from the sequence of arrays in op based on the integer values in self. The arrays must all be broadcastable to the same shape and the entries in self should be between 0 and len(op). The output is placed in ret unless it is NULL in which case a new output is created. The clipmode argument determines behavior for when entries in self are not between 0 and len(op).
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.choose （self，op，ret，clipmode）。通过根据self中的整数值从op中的数组序列中选择元素来创建新数组。数组必须都可以广播为相同形状，并且self中的条目应在0​​到len（op）之间。除非它为 NULL ，否则输出将放置在ret中，在这种情况下，将创建一个新的输出。所述clipmode参数确定用于当在条目行为自不介于0和LEN（OP）。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.clip (self, min, max). Clip an array, self, so that values larger than max are fixed to max and values less than min are fixed to min.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.clip （self，min，max）。自我裁剪数组，以便将大于max的值固定为max，将小于min的值固定为min。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.compress (self, condition, axis ). Return the elements along axis corresponding to elements of condition that are true.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.compress （self，condition，axis）。沿轴返回与条件为true的元素相对应的元素。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.conjugate (self). Return the complex conjugate of self. If self is not of complex data type, then return self with a reference.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.conjugate （self）。返回self的复共轭。如果self不是复杂的数据类型，则返回带有引用的self。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.copy (self, fortran). Make a copy of the old array. The returned array is always aligned and writeable with data interpreted the same as the old array. If order is NPY_CORDER, then a C-style contiguous array is returned. If order is NPY_FORTRANORDER, then a Fortran-style contiguous array is returned. If order isNPY_ANYORDER, then the array returned is Fortran-style contiguous only if the old one is; otherwise, it is C-style contiguous.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.copy （self，fortran）。复制旧数组。返回的数组始终与可解释的数组对齐和写入，与旧数组解释的数据相同。如果order为 NPY_CORDER ，则返回C样式的连续数组。如果order为 NPY_FORTRANORDER ，则返回一个Fortran样式的连续数组。如果order为 NPY_ANYORDER ，则仅当旧数组为数组时，返回的数组才为Fortran样式的连续数组。否则，它是C样式连续的。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.cumprod (self, axis, rtype). Return 1-d cumulative products of elements in self along axis. Perform the product after converting data to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.cumprod （self，axis，rtype）。沿 axis 返回 self 中元素的一维累积积。将数据转换为数据类型 rtype 后执行产品。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.cumsum (self, axis, rtype). Return cumulative 1-d sums of elements in self along axis. Perform the sum after converting data to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.cumsum （self，axis，rtype）。沿轴返回自身中元素的累积一维和。将数据转换为数据类型rtype后执行求和。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.diagonal (self, offset, axis1, axis2 ). Return the offset diagonals of the 2-d arrays defined by axis1 and axis2.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.diagonal （自我，偏移，轴1，Axis2的）。返回由axis1和axis2定义的二维数组的偏移对角线。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.flatten (self, order). Return a 1-d copy of the array. If order is NPY_FORTRANORDER the elements are scanned out in Fortran order (first-dimension varies the fastest). If order is NPY_CORDER, the elements of self are scanned in C-order (last dimension varies the fastest). If orderNPY_ANYORDER, then the result of PyArray_ISFORTRAN (self) is used to determine which order to flatten.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.flatten （self，order）。返回数组的一维副本。如果order为 NPY_FORTRANORDER ,则按Fortran顺序扫描出元素（第一维变化最快）。如果order为 NPY_CORDER ，则按C顺序扫描 self 的元素（最后一个维度变化最快）。如果订单为 NPY_ANYORDER ，则使用 PyArray_ISFORTRAN （self）的结果来确定要展平的订单。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.getfield (self, dtype, offset). This function steals a reference to PyArray_Descr and returns a new array of the given dtype using the data in the current array at a specified offset in bytes. The offset plus the itemsize of the new array type must be less than self ->descr->elsize or an error is raised. The same shape and strides as the original array are used. Therefore, this function has the effect of returning a field from a structured array. But, it can also be used to select specific bytes or groups of bytes from any array type.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.getfield （自我，D型，抵消）。此函数窃取的引用到 PyArray_Descr 并返回给定的一个新的数组 dtype 使用所述数据的当前阵列中在指定的 offset （字节）。新数组类型的 offset 加上项目大小必须小于 self ->descr->elsize 否则会引发错误。使用与原始数组相同的形状和步幅。因此，此函数具有从结构化数组返回字段的作用。但是，它也可以用于从任何数组类型中选择特定的字节或字节组。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.max (self, axis). Returns the largest element of self along the given axis. When the result is a single element, returns a numpy scalar instead of an ndarray.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.max （self，axis）。返回沿给定轴的最大self元素。当结果是单个元素时，返回一个numpy标量而不是ndarray。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.mean (self, axis, rtype). Returns the mean of the elements along the given axis, using the enumerated type rtype as the data type to sum in. Default sum behavior is obtained using NPY_NOTYPE for rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.mean （self，axis，rtype）。使用枚举类型rtype作为要求和的数据类型，返回沿给定轴的元素的平均值。使用 NPY_NOTYPE 的NPY_NOTYPE获得默认的求和行为。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.min (self, axis). Return the smallest element of self along the given axis. When the result is a single element, returns a numpy scalar instead of an ndarray.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.min （self，axis）。沿给定轴返回self的最小元素。当结果是单个元素时，返回一个numpy标量而不是ndarray。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.nonzero (self). Returns a tuple of index arrays that select elements of self that are nonzero. If (nd= PyArray_NDIM ( self ))==1, then a single index array is returned. The index arrays have data type NPY_INTP. If a tuple is returned (nd
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.nonzero （self）。返回索引数组的元组，该数组选择非零值的self元素。如果（nd = PyArray_NDIM （ self ））== 1，则返回单个索引数组。索引数组的数据类型为 NPY_INTP 。如果返回一个元组（nd

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.partition (self, ktharray, axis, kind). Partitions the array so that the values of the element indexed by ktharray are in the positions they would be if the array is fully sorted and places all elements smaller than the kth before and all elements equal or greater after the kth element. The ordering of all elements within the partitions is undefined. If self->descr is a data-type with fields defined, then self->descr->names is used to determine the sort order. A comparison where the first field is equal will use the second field and so on. To alter the sort order of a structured array, create a new data-type with a different order of names and construct a view of the array with that new data-type. Returns zero on success and -1 on failure.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.partition （self，ktharray，axis，kind）。对数组进行分区，以使ktharray索引的元素的值处于如果数组完全排序后的位置，并且将所有小于kth的元素放置在第k个元素的前面，并将所有大于或等于kth元素的元素放置在第k个元素之后。分区中所有元素的顺序是不确定的。如果自我-> descr是定义了字段的数据类型，然后使用self-> descr-> names确定排序顺序。第一个字段相等的比较将使用第二个字段，依此类推。要更改结构化数组的排序顺序，请创建具有不同名称顺序的新数据类型，并使用该新数据类型构造数组的视图。成功返回零，失败返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.prod (self, axis, rtype). Return 1-d products of elements in self along axis. Perform the product after converting data to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.prod （self，axis，rtype）。沿轴返回自身的一维元素乘积。将数据转换为数据类型rtype后执行产品。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.ptp (self, axis). Return the difference between the largest element of self along axis and the smallest element of self along axis. When the result is a single element, returns a numpy scalar instead of an ndarray.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.ptp （self，axis）。返回的最大元素之间的差异自我沿轴和的最小元素自我沿轴线。当结果是单个元素时，返回一个numpy标量而不是ndarray。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.repeat (self, op, axis). Copy the elements of self, op times along the given axis. Either op is a scalar integer or a sequence of length self ->dimensions[ axis ] indicating how many times to repeat each item along the axis.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.repeat （self，op，axis）。沿给定轴复制self元素，op time元素。无论哪种运算是一个标量整数或长度的序列的自- >尺寸[轴指示多少次沿轴线重复的每个项目。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.reshape (self, shape) where shape is a sequence. Converts shape to a PyArray_Dims structure and calls PyArray_Newshape internally. For back-ward compatibility – Not recommended
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.reshape （self，shape），其中shape是一个序列。将shape转换为 PyArray_Dims 结构，并 PyArray_Newshape 内部调用PyArray_Newshape。为了向后兼容-不建议

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.resize (self, newshape, refcheck =refcheck, order= fortran ). This function only works on single-segment arrays. It changes the shape of self inplace and will reallocate the memory for self if newshape has a different total number of elements then the old shape. If reallocation is necessary, then self must own its data, have self - >base==NULL, have self - >weakrefs==NULL, and (unless refcheck is 0) not be referenced by any other array. The fortran argument can be NPY_ANYORDER, NPY_CORDER, or NPY_FORTRANORDER. It currently has no effect. Eventually it could be used to determine how the resize operation should view the data when constructing a differently-dimensioned array. Returns None on success and NULL on error.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.resize （self，newshape，refcheck = refcheck，order = fortran）。此功能仅适用于单段阵列。它改变的形状自就位，并且将重新分配所述存储器中用于自我如果newshape具有元素的不同总数，则旧的形状。如果重新分配是必要的，那么自必须拥有自己的数据，具有自- >base==NULL ，具有自- >weakrefs==NULL ，和（除非refcheck是0）不能被任何其他阵列中被引用。 fortran参数可以是 NPY_ANYORDER ， NPY_CORDER 或 NPY_FORTRANORDER 。目前无效。最终，它可以用来确定在构建不同维数的数组时调整大小操作应如何查看数据。成功返回None，错误返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.round (self, decimals, out). Returns the array with elements rounded to the nearest decimal place. The decimal place is defined as the
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.round （自我，小数，出来）。返回具有四舍五入到最接近的小数位的元素的数组。小数位定义为

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.searchsorted (self, values, side, perm). Assuming self is a 1-d array in ascending order, then the output is an array of indices the same shape as values such that, if the elements in values were inserted before the indices, the order of self would be preserved. No checking is done on whether or not self is in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.searchsorted （self，values，side，perm）。假设self是一个按升序排列的1维数组，则输出是一个索引数组，其形状与值相同，因此，如果将value中的元素插入到索引之前，将保留self的顺序。不检查自身是否升序。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.setfield (self, val, dtype, offset ). Set the field starting at offset in bytes and of the given dtype to val. The offset plus dtype ->elsize must be less than self ->descr->elsize or an error is raised. Otherwise, the val argument is converted to an array and copied into the field pointed to. If necessary, the elements of val are repeated to fill the destination array, But, the number of elements in the destination must be an integer multiple of the number of elements in val.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.setfield （self，val，dtype，offset）。将以给定dtype的字节偏移量开始的字段设置为val。的偏移量加上D型- > elsize必须小于自- > descr-> elsize或引发错误。否则，val参数将转换为数组并复制到指向的字段中。如有必要，重复val的元素以填充目标数组，但是，目标中的元素数必须是in中元素数的整数倍。VAL。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.sort (self, axis, kind). Return an array with the items of self sorted along axis. The array is sorted using the algorithm denoted by kind, which is an integer/enum pointing to the type of sorting algorithms used.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.sort （self，axis，kind）。返回一个数组，其中self的项沿axis排序。使用kind表示的算法对数组进行排序，后者是一个整数/枚举，指向所使用的排序算法的类型。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.squeeze (self). Return a new view of self with all of the dimensions of length 1 removed from the shape.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.squeeze （self）。返回一个新的self视图，其中所有长度为1的尺寸都从形状中删除。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.std (self, axis, rtype). Return the standard deviation using data along axis converted to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.std （self，axis，rtype）。使用沿转换为数据类型rtype的轴上的数据返回标准偏差。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.sum (self, axis, rtype). Return 1-d vector sums of elements in self along axis. Perform the sum after converting data to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.sum （self，axis，rtype）。沿axis返回自身中元素的一维向量和。将数据转换为数据类型rtype后执行求和。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.swapaxes (self, a1, a2). The returned array is a new view of the data in self with the given axes, a1 and a2, swapped.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.swapaxes （self，a1，a2）。返回的数组是交换了给定轴a1和a2的self数据的新视图。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.take (self, indices, axis, ret, clipmode) except axis =None in Python is obtained by setting axis = NPY_MAXDIMS in C. Extract the items from self indicated by the integer-valued indices along the given axis. The clipmode argument can be NPY_RAISE, NPY_WRAP, or NPY_CLIP to indicate what to do with out-of-bound indices. The ret argument can specify an output array rather than having one created internally.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.take （自，指数，轴，RET，clipmode）除轴=无在Python通过设置获得轴= NPY_MAXDIMS 中C.提取项从自指示由整数值索引沿给定轴线。 clipmode参数可以是 NPY_RAISE ， NPY_WRAP 或 NPY_CLIP 来指示如何处理越界索引。的RET参数可以指定，而不是在内部创建一个输出阵列。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.tobytes (self, order). Return the bytes of this array in a Python string.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.tobytes （self，order）。以Python字符串返回此数组的字节。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.tolist (self). Return a nested Python list from self.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.tolist （self）。从self返回一个嵌套的Python列表。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.trace (self, offset, axis1, axis2, rtype). Return the sum (using rtype as the data type of summation) over the offset diagonal elements of the 2-d arrays defined by axis1 and axis2 variables. A positive offset chooses diagonals above the main diagonal. A negative offset selects diagonals below the main diagonal.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.trace （自我，偏移，轴1，Axis2的，舍入类型）。返回由axis1和axis2变量定义的二维数组的偏移对角线元素的总和（使用rtype作为求和的数据类型）。正偏移量选择主对角线上方的对角线。负偏移量选择主对角线以下的对角线。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.transpose (self, permute). Permute the axes of the ndarray object self according to the data structure permute and return the result. If permute is NULL, then the resulting array has its axes reversed. For example if self has shape
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.transpose （自我，置换）。根据数据结构置换ndarray对象自身的轴，并返回结果。如果permute为 NULL ，那么结果数组的轴将反转。例如，如果自己有形状

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.view (self, dtype). Return a new view of the array self as possibly a different data-type, dtype, and different array subclass ptype.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.view （自我，D型）。返回一个数组self的新视图，该视图可能是另一个data-type，dtype和另一个array子类ptype。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.all (self, axis). Return an array with True elements for every 1-d sub-array of self defined by axis in which all the elements are True.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.all （self，axis）。对于 axis 定义的 self 定义的每个1-d子数组，返回一个包含True元素的数组，其中所有元素均为True。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.any (self, axis). Return an array with True elements for every 1-d sub-array of self defined by axis in which any of the elements are True.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.any （self，axis）。对于由其中任何元素为True的axis定义的self的每个1-d子数组，返回一个包含True元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.argmax (self, axis). Return the index of the largest element of self along axis.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.argmax （self，axis）。返回self沿axis的最大元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.argmin (self, axis). Return the index of the smallest element of self along axis.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.argmin （self，axis）。返回自身最小元素沿轴的索引。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.argpartition (self, ktharray, axis, kind). Return an array of indices such that selection of these indices along the given axis would return a partitioned version of self.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.argpartition （self，ktharray，axis，kind）。返回一个索引数组，这样沿给定 axis 选择这些索引将返回self的分区版本。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.argsort (self, axis). Return an array of indices such that selection of these indices along the given axis would return a sorted version of self. If self ->descr is a data-type with fields defined, then self->descr->names is used to determine the sort order. A comparison where the first field is equal will use the second field and so on. To alter the sort order of a structured array, create a new data-type with a different order of names and construct a view of the array with that new data-type.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.argsort （self，axis）。返回索引数组，以便沿给定 axis 选择这些索引将返回self的排序版本。如果self- > descr是定义了字段的数据类型，则使用self-> descr-> names确定排序顺序。第一个字段相等的比较将使用第二个字段，依此类推。要更改结构化数组的排序顺序，请创建具有不同名称顺序的新数据类型，并使用该新数据类型构造数组的视图。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.byteswap (self, inplace). Return an array whose data area is byteswapped. If inplace is non-zero, then do the byteswap inplace and return a reference to self. Otherwise, create a byteswapped copy and leave self unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.byteswap （个体经营，就地）。返回其数据区域为字节包装的数组。如果就地不为零，然后执行字节交换就地并返回一个引用自我。否则，请创建一个字节包装的副本，并使自己保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.choose (self, op, ret, clipmode). Create a new array by selecting elements from the sequence of arrays in op based on the integer values in self. The arrays must all be broadcastable to the same shape and the entries in self should be between 0 and len(op). The output is placed in ret unless it is NULL in which case a new output is created. The clipmode argument determines behavior for when entries in self are not between 0 and len(op).
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.choose （self，op，ret，clipmode）。通过根据self中的整数值从op中的数组序列中选择元素来创建新数组。数组必须都可以广播为相同形状，并且self中的条目应在0​​到len（op）之间。除非它为 NULL ，否则输出将放置在ret中，在这种情况下，将创建新的输出。所述clipmode参数确定用于当在条目行为自不介于0和LEN（OP）。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.clip (self, min, max). Clip an array, self, so that values larger than max are fixed to max and values less than min are fixed to min.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.clip （self，min，max）。自我裁剪数组，以便将大于max的值固定为max，将小于min的值固定为min。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.compress (self, condition, axis ). Return the elements along axis corresponding to elements of condition that are true.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.compress （self，condition，axis）。沿轴返回与条件为true 的元素相对应的元素。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.conjugate (self). Return the complex conjugate of self. If self is not of complex data type, then return self with a reference.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.conjugate （self）。返回self的复共轭。如果self不是复杂的数据类型，则返回带有引用的self。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.copy (self, fortran). Make a copy of the old array. The returned array is always aligned and writeable with data interpreted the same as the old array. If order is NPY_CORDER, then a C-style contiguous array is returned. If order is NPY_FORTRANORDER, then a Fortran-style contiguous array is returned. If order isNPY_ANYORDER, then the array returned is Fortran-style contiguous only if the old one is; otherwise, it is C-style contiguous.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.copy （self，fortran）。复制旧数组。返回的数组始终与可解释的数组对齐和写入，与旧数组解释的数据相同。如果order为 NPY_CORDER ，则返回C样式的连续数组。如果order为 NPY_FORTRANORDER ，则返回一个Fortran样式的连续数组。如果order为 NPY_ANYORDER ，则仅当旧数组为数组时，返回的数组才为Fortran样式的连续数组。否则，它是C样式连续的。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.cumprod (self, axis, rtype). Return 1-d cumulative products of elements in self along axis. Perform the product after converting data to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.cumprod （self，axis，rtype）。沿 axis 返回 self 中元素的一维累积积。将数据转换为数据类型 rtype 后执行产品。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.cumsum (self, axis, rtype). Return cumulative 1-d sums of elements in self along axis. Perform the sum after converting data to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.cumsum （self，axis，rtype）。沿轴返回自身中元素的累积一维和。将数据转换为数据类型rtype后执行求和。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.diagonal (self, offset, axis1, axis2 ). Return the offset diagonals of the 2-d arrays defined by axis1 and axis2.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.diagonal （自我，偏移，轴1，Axis2的）。返回由axis1和axis2定义的二维数组的偏移对角线。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.flatten (self, order). Return a 1-d copy of the array. If order is NPY_FORTRANORDER the elements are scanned out in Fortran order (first-dimension varies the fastest). If order is NPY_CORDER, the elements of self are scanned in C-order (last dimension varies the fastest). If orderNPY_ANYORDER, then the result of PyArray_ISFORTRAN (self) is used to determine which order to flatten.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.flatten （self，order）。返回数组的一维副本。如果order为 NPY_FORTRANORDER ,则按 Fortran顺序扫描出元素（第一维变化最快）。如果order为 NPY_CORDER ，则按 C顺序扫描 self 的元素（最后一个维度变化最快）。如果订单为 NPY_ANYORDER ，则使用 PyArray_ISFORTRAN （self）的结果来确定要展平的订单。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.getfield (self, dtype, offset). This function steals a reference to PyArray_Descr and returns a new array of the given dtype using the data in the current array at a specified offset in bytes. The offset plus the itemsize of the new array type must be less than self ->descr->elsize or an error is raised. The same shape and strides as the original array are used. Therefore, this function has the effect of returning a field from a structured array. But, it can also be used to select specific bytes or groups of bytes from any array type.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.getfield （自我，D型，抵消）。此函数窃取的引用到 PyArray_Descr 并返回给定的一个新的数组 dtype 使用所述数据的当前阵列中在指定的 offset （字节）。的 offset 的新的数组类型的加itemsize必须小于 self ->descr->elsize 或引发错误。使用与原始数组相同的形状和步幅。因此，此函数具有从结构化数组返回字段的作用。但是，它也可以用于从任何数组类型中选择特定的字节或字节组。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.max (self, axis). Returns the largest element of self along the given axis. When the result is a single element, returns a numpy scalar instead of an ndarray.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.max （self，axis）。返回沿给定轴的最大self元素。当结果是单个元素时，返回一个numpy标量而不是ndarray。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.mean (self, axis, rtype). Returns the mean of the elements along the given axis, using the enumerated type rtype as the data type to sum in. Default sum behavior is obtained using NPY_NOTYPE for rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.mean （self，axis，rtype）。使用枚举类型rtype作为要求和的数据类型，返回沿给定轴的元素的平均值。默认的求和行为是使用 NPY_NOTYPE 来获取rtype的。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.min (self, axis). Return the smallest element of self along the given axis. When the result is a single element, returns a numpy scalar instead of an ndarray.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.min （self，axis）。沿给定轴返回self的最小元素。当结果是单个元素时，返回一个numpy标量而不是ndarray。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.nonzero (self). Returns a tuple of index arrays that select elements of self that are nonzero. If (nd= PyArray_NDIM ( self ))==1, then a single index array is returned. The index arrays have data type NPY_INTP. If a tuple is returned (nd
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.nonzero （self）。返回索引数组的元组，该数组选择非零值的self元素。如果（nd = PyArray_NDIM （ self ））== 1，则返回单个索引数组。索引数组的数据类型为 NPY_INTP 。如果返回一个元组（nd

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.partition (self, ktharray, axis, kind). Partitions the array so that the values of the element indexed by ktharray are in the positions they would be if the array is fully sorted and places all elements smaller than the kth before and all elements equal or greater after the kth element. The ordering of all elements within the partitions is undefined. If self->descr is a data-type with fields defined, then self->descr->names is used to determine the sort order. A comparison where the first field is equal will use the second field and so on. To alter the sort order of a structured array, create a new data-type with a different order of names and construct a view of the array with that new data-type. Returns zero on success and -1 on failure.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.partition （self，ktharray，axis，kind）。对数组进行分区，以使ktharray索引的元素的值位于如果数组完全排序后的位置，并且将所有小于kth的元素放在kth元素之前，并将所有大于或等于kth元素的元素放在后面。分区中所有元素的顺序是不确定的。如果自我-> descr是定义了字段的数据类型，然后使用self-> descr-> names确定排序顺序。第一个字段相等的比较将使用第二个字段，依此类推。要更改结构化数组的排序顺序，请创建具有不同名称顺序的新数据类型，并使用该新数据类型构造数组的视图。成功返回零，失败返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.prod (self, axis, rtype). Return 1-d products of elements in self along axis. Perform the product after converting data to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.prod （self，axis，rtype）。沿轴返回自身的一维元素乘积。将数据转换为数据类型rtype后执行产品。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.ptp (self, axis). Return the difference between the largest element of self along axis and the smallest element of self along axis. When the result is a single element, returns a numpy scalar instead of an ndarray.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.ptp （self，axis）。返回的最大元素之间的差异自我沿轴和的最小元素自我沿轴线。如果结果是单个元素，则返回一个numpy标量而不是ndarray。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.repeat (self, op, axis). Copy the elements of self, op times along the given axis. Either op is a scalar integer or a sequence of length self ->dimensions[ axis ] indicating how many times to repeat each item along the axis.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.repeat （self，op，axis）。沿给定的轴复制self元素，op时间。无论哪种运算是一个标量整数或长度的序列的自 - >尺寸[ 轴指示多少次沿轴线重复的每个项目。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.reshape (self, shape) where shape is a sequence. Converts shape to a PyArray_Dims structure and calls PyArray_Newshape internally. For back-ward compatibility – Not recommended
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.reshape （self，shape），其中shape是一个序列。将shape转换为 PyArray_Dims 结构，并 PyArray_Newshape 内部调用PyArray_Newshape。向后兼容–不推荐

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.resize (self, newshape, refcheck =refcheck, order= fortran ). This function only works on single-segment arrays. It changes the shape of self inplace and will reallocate the memory for self if newshape has a different total number of elements then the old shape. If reallocation is necessary, then self must own its data, have self - >base==NULL, have self - >weakrefs==NULL, and (unless refcheck is 0) not be referenced by any other array. The fortran argument can be NPY_ANYORDER, NPY_CORDER, or NPY_FORTRANORDER. It currently has no effect. Eventually it could be used to determine how the resize operation should view the data when constructing a differently-dimensioned array. Returns None on success and NULL on error.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.resize （self，newshape，refcheck = refcheck，order = fortran）。此功能仅适用于单段阵列。它改变的形状自就位，并且将重新分配所述存储器中用于自我如果newshape具有元素的不同总数，则旧的形状。如果重新分配是必要的，那么自必须拥有自己的数据，具有自 - >base==NULL ，具有自 - >weakrefs==NULL ，和（除非refcheck是0）不能被任何其他阵列中被引用。 fortran参数可以是 NPY_ANYORDER ， NPY_CORDER 或 NPY_FORTRANORDER 。目前无效。最终，它可用于确定在构建不同维度的数组时调整大小操作应如何查看数据。成功返回None，错误返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.round (self, decimals, out). Returns the array with elements rounded to the nearest decimal place. The decimal place is defined as the
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ndarray.round （自我，小数，出来）。返回元素四舍五入到最接近的小数位的数组。小数位定义为

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.searchsorted (self, values, side, perm). Assuming self is a 1-d array in ascending order, then the output is an array of indices the same shape as values such that, if the elements in values were inserted before the indices, the order of self would be preserved. No checking is done on whether or not self is in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.searchsorted （self，values，side，perm）。假设self是一个升序的1维数组，那么输出是一个索引数组，其形状与值相同，因此，如果将value中的元素插入到索引之前，则self的顺序将得以保留。不检查自身是否升序。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.setfield (self, val, dtype, offset ). Set the field starting at offset in bytes and of the given dtype to val. The offset plus dtype ->elsize must be less than self ->descr->elsize or an error is raised. Otherwise, the val argument is converted to an array and copied into the field pointed to. If necessary, the elements of val are repeated to fill the destination array, But, the number of elements in the destination must be an integer multiple of the number of elements in val.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.sort (self, axis, kind). Return an array with the items of self sorted along axis. The array is sorted using the algorithm denoted by kind , which is an integer/enum pointing to the type of sorting algorithms used.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.sort （self，axis，kind）。返回一个数组，其中self的项沿axis排序。使用kind表示的算法对数组进行排序，后者是一个整数/枚举，指向所使用的排序算法的类型。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.squeeze (self). Return a new view of self with all of the dimensions of length 1 removed from the shape.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.squeeze （self）。返回一个新的self视图，将所有长度为1的尺寸从图形中删除。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.std (self, axis, rtype). Return the standard deviation using data along axis converted to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.std （self，axis，rtype）。使用沿轴的数据返回转换为数据类型rtype的标准差。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.sum (self, axis, rtype). Return 1-d vector sums of elements in self along axis. Perform the sum after converting data to data type rtype.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.sum （self，axis，rtype）。沿axis返回自身中元素的一维向量和。将数据转换为数据类型rtype后执行求和。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.swapaxes (self, a1, a2). The returned array is a new view of the data in self with the given axes, a1 and a2, swapped.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 ndarray.swapaxes （self，a1，a2）。返回的数组是交换了给定轴a1和a2的自身数据的新视图。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.take (self, indices, axis, ret, clipmode) except axis =None in Python is obtained by setting axis = NPY_MAXDIMS in C. Extract the items from self indicated by the integer-valued indices along the given axis. The clipmode argument can be NPY_RAISE, NPY_WRAP, or NPY_CLIP to indicate what to do with out-of-bound indices. The ret argument can specify an output array rather than having one created internally.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ndarray.tobytes (self, order). Return the bytes of this array in a Python string.

A positive offset chooses diagonals above the main diagonal. A negative offset selects diagonals below the main diagonal.

trans-unit.source: Even for contiguous arrays a stride for a given dimension arr.strides[dim] may be arbitrary if arr.shape[dim] == 1 or the array has no elements. It does not generally hold that self.strides[-1] == self.itemsize for C-style contiguous arrays or self.strides[0] == self.itemsize for Fortran-style contiguous arrays is true.
trans-unit.target: 即使对于连续的数组，如果 arr.shape[dim] == 1 或数组中没有元素，则给定维度 arr.strides[dim] 的跨度也可以是任意的。它并没有普遍认为， self.strides[-1] == self.itemsize 为C语言风格的连续阵列或 self.strides[0] == self.itemsize Fortran的风格的连续阵列是真实的。

trans-unit.source: Even for contiguous arrays a stride for a given dimension arr.strides[dim] may be arbitrary if arr.shape[dim] == 1 or the array has no elements. It does not generally hold that self.strides[-1] == self.itemsize for C-style contiguous arrays or self.strides[0] == self.itemsize for Fortran-style contiguous arrays is true. The correct way to access the itemsize of an array from the C API is PyArray_ITEMSIZE(arr).
trans-unit.target: 即使对于连续的数组，如果 arr.shape[dim] == 1 或数组中没有元素，则给定维度 arr.strides[dim] 的跨度也可以是任意的。它并没有普遍认为， self.strides[-1] == self.itemsize 为C语言风格的连续阵列或 self.strides[0] == self.itemsize Fortran的风格的连续阵列是真实的。从C API 访问数组的项目 itemsize 的正确方法是 PyArray_ITEMSIZE(arr) 。

trans-unit.source: Every Python module, extension module, or subpackage in the SciPy package directory should have a corresponding test_<name>.py file. Pytest examines these files for test methods (named test*) and test classes (named Test*).
trans-unit.target: SciPy软件包目录中的每个Python模块，扩展模块或子软件包均应具有相应的 test_<name>.py 文件。Pytest检查这些文件中的测试方法（名为test *）和测试类（名为Test *）。

trans-unit.source: Every module should have a docstring at the very top of the file. The module’s docstring may extend over multiple lines. If your docstring does extend over multiple lines, the closing three quotation marks must be on a line by itself, preferably preceded by a blank line.
trans-unit.target: 每个模块的文件顶部都应有一个docstring。模块的文档字符串可能会跨越多行。如果您的文档字符串确实跨越了多行，则最后三个引号必须单独位于一行上，最好在其前面加上一个空行。

trans-unit.source: Every ufunc calculation involves some overhead related to setting up the calculation. The practical significance of this overhead is that even though the actual calculation of the ufunc is very fast, you will be able to write array and type-specific code that will work faster for small arrays than the ufunc. In particular, using ufuncs to perform many calculations on 0-D arrays will be slower than other Python-based solutions (the silently-imported scalarmath module exists precisely to give array scalars the look-and-feel of ufunc based calculations with significantly reduced overhead).
trans-unit.target: 每一个ufunc计算都涉及到一些与设置计算相关的开销。这个开销的实际意义在于,即使ufunc的实际计算速度非常快,你也能写出针对数组和类型的代码,这些代码对于小数组的工作速度会比ufunc快。特别是,使用ufuncs在0-D数组上进行许多计算,会比其他基于Python的解决方案慢(默默导入的scalarmath模块的存在,正是为了让数组标量具有基于ufunc计算的外观和感觉,同时大大降低开销)。

trans-unit.source: Extension modules were discussed in Writing an extension module. The most basic way to interface with compiled code is to write an extension module and construct a module method that calls the compiled code. For improved readability, your method should take advantage of the PyArg_ParseTuple call to convert between Python objects and C data-types. For standard C data-types there is probably already a built-in converter. For others you may need to write your own converter and use the "O&" format string which allows you to specify a function that will be used to perform the conversion from the Python object to whatever C-structures are needed.
trans-unit.target: 在编写扩展模块中讨论了扩展模块。与已编译代码交互的最基本方法是编写扩展模块并构造一个调用已编译代码的模块方法。为了提高可读性，您的方法应利用 PyArg_ParseTuple 调用在Python对象和C数据类型之间进行转换。对于标准C数据类型，可能已经有一个内置转换器。对于其他人，您可能需要编写自己的转换器并使用 "O&" 格式字符串，该字符串允许您指定一个函数，该函数将用于执行从Python对象到所需C结构的转换。

trans-unit.source: F2PY can be used either as a command line tool f2py or as a Python module numpy.f2py. While we try to install the command line tool as part of the numpy setup, some platforms like Windows make it difficult to reliably put the executable on the PATH. We will refer to f2py in this document but you may have to run it as a module:
trans-unit.target: F2PY可用作命令行工具 f2py 或Python模块 numpy.f2py 。虽然我们尝试将命令行工具作为numpy安装程序的一部分进行安装，但是某些平台（例如Windows）很难将可执行文件可靠地放置在 PATH 上。我们将在本文档中引用 f2py ，但您可能必须将其作为模块运行：

trans-unit.source: F2PY compiles all sources and builds an extension module containing the wrappers. In building extension modules, F2PY uses numpy_distutils that supports a number of Fortran 77/90/95 compilers, including Gnu, Intel, Sun Fortre, SGI MIPSpro, Absoft, NAG, Compaq etc. compilers.
trans-unit.target: F2PY编译所有源代码并构建一个包含包装程序的扩展模块。在构建扩展模块时，F2PY使用 numpy_distutils 支持许多Fortran 77/90/95编译器，包括Gnu，Intel，Sun Fortre，SGI MIPSpro，Absoft，NAG，Compaq等编译器。

trans-unit.source: F2PY directive has the following form:
trans-unit.target: F2PY指令的形式如下:

trans-unit.source: F2PY directives
trans-unit.target: F2PY指令

trans-unit.source: F2PY generated interface is very flexible with respect to call-back arguments. For each call-back argument an additional optional argument <name>_extra_args is introduced by F2PY. This argument can be used to pass extra arguments to user provided call-back arguments.
trans-unit.target: F2PY生成的接口在回调参数方面非常灵活。对于每个回调参数， <name>_extra_args 会引入一个附加的可选参数<name> _extra_args。此参数可用于将其他参数传递给用户提供的回调参数。

trans-unit.source: F2PY generated wrapper functions accept (almost) any Python object as a string argument, str is applied for non-string objects. Exceptions are NumPy arrays that must have type code 'c' or '1' when used as string arguments.
trans-unit.target: F2PY生成的包装器函数接受（几乎）任何Python对象作为字符串参数， str 应用于非字符串对象。NumPy数组用作字符串参数时必须具有类型代码 'c' 或 '1' ，这是例外。

trans-unit.source: F2PY generates wrappers to common blocks defined in a routine signature block. Common blocks are visible by all Fortran codes linked with the current extension module, but not to other extension modules (this restriction is due to how Python imports shared libraries). In Python, the F2PY wrappers to common blocks are fortran type objects that have (dynamic) attributes related to data members of common blocks. When accessed, these attributes return as NumPy array objects (multidimensional arrays are Fortran-contiguous) that directly link to data members in common blocks. Data members can be changed by direct assignment or by in-place changes to the corresponding array objects.
trans-unit.target: F2PY为常规签名块中定义的 common 块生成包装器。与当前扩展模块链接的所有Fortran代码都可以看到公共块，但对其他扩展模块不可见（这些限制是由于Python如何导入共享库）。在Python中， common 块的F2PY包装器是具有与公共块的数据成员相关的（动态）属性的 fortran 类型对象。当访问这些属性时，它们将作为直接链接到公共块中数据成员的NumPy数组对象（多维数组是Fortran连续的）返回。可以通过直接分配或通过对相应数组对象进行就地更改来更改数据成员。

trans-unit.source: F2PY generates wrappers to all entry names using the signature of the routine block.
trans-unit.target: F2PY使用例程块的签名为所有条目名生成包装器。
